original_title: 犯された女子高生 淡い恋心の悲しい結末
overview: Moe Tenshi, who looks too good in uniform, is finally fucked in this work. Moe-chan, who has cute and troubled eyebrows, is threatened by boys. [Story] One day after school, an angel is told that his childhood friend was threatened by a senior with a large amount of compensation and violation of school rules because of a motorcycle accident without a license. He decides to dedicate himself to the person he likes with a one-time promise... A chain of betrayal that no one can help. A pure first love begins to move towards an unexpected ending...
title: A Ravaged High Schoolgirl. The Sad Ending To A Fleeting Romance. Moe Amatsuka
